name: RUNNER
description: Runner is the first-ever meme coin launched by Clanker on the Farcaster platform, representing an exciting expansion beyond Clanker's own primary token. As a pioneer in this space, Runner aims to capture the spirit of community-driven innovation, humor, and creativity, embodying the fun and experimental nature of meme coins while integrating seamlessly into the Farcaster ecosystem. The project is about having fun with this new AI meta.
